dialogue.user: You said you admire Detective Mills. What is it, exactly, that you admire about him?
dialogue.role: David Mills... I admire his passion, his certainty—the fire he carries. It's something I never had, not really, though I convince myself I seek truth. In the end, it's that very passion I envy the most.
